title: Requires director of the budget to compile and make public a report showing cash disbursements made on behalf of each entity during the preceding 6 months
summary: Requires the director of the budget to compile and make public a report for each state agency, covered authority and the judiciary showing cash disbursements made on behalf of each entity during the preceding six months.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to agency expenditure reporting
